summary: This is an email chain from October 9, 2020, between personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The emails discuss coordinating a call regarding Ghislaine Maxwell and an update on the FBI's review of images from Jeffrey Epstein's devices.

events.title: SDNY Email Coordination on Maxwell Case
events.description: Personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York exchange emails to schedule a call for an update on the Ghislaine Maxwell case and discuss the FBI's progress on reviewing images from Epstein's devices.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated October 9, 2020, involving the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The subject of the emails is Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating ongoing case coordination.
The emails reference an FBI review of images from Jeffrey Epstein's devices, confirming ongoing investigative work.
All sender and recipient names in the email headers are redacted, appearing as '(USANYS)' placeholders.
The correspondence shows internal SDNY coordination, including scheduling a call and task follow-up regarding the Maxwell investigation.
